description:
Anna is http://anidb.net/ch11678 [Lloyd]`s real mother. She is never seen in the game, and in the animation only a silhouette of her is shown, up until the very last episode, where she is shown very shortly from the back.
She turned into a monster after her Exsphere was removed, because it was attached without a Key Crest to protect her. http://anidb.net/ch11682 [Kratos] was forced to kill her, to save their son`s life.
name: Anna Irving
